articles.author: Jennifer Hiller,Svea Herbst-bayliss
articles.title: Engine No. 1 extends gains with a third seat on Exxon board - Reuters
articles.description: Exxon Mobil Corp (XOM.N) shareholders elected a third director nominated by hedge fund Engine No. 1 to the oil company's board, the company said on Wednesday, extending the firm's upset victory at one of America's most iconic corporations.
articles.content: A view of the ExxonMobil Baton Rouge Refinery in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, U.S., May 15, 2021. REUTERS/Kathleen FlynnExxon Mobil Corp (XOM.N) shareholders elected a third director nominated by hedge fu… [+2654 chars]

articles.author: Erik Swann
articles.title: After Simon Cowell’s Back Injury, Howie Mandel Shares Feelings About Reuniting With Him For New Season Of America’s Got Talent - CinemaBlend
articles.description: Howie Mandel discusses what it was like to reunite with Simon Cowell for America's Got Talent Season 16.
articles.content: It had been a long time coming, but Simon Cowell finally made his return for the new season of Americas Got Talent, and the host didnt seem to miss a beat during the premiere. Cowells return was a bi… [+2470 chars]

articles.title: Sailing: Hosting next America's Cup in Auckland 'doesn't make sense', says leading economist - Newshub
articles.description: "When governments compete with each other to subsidise boat races that rich people tend to enjoy, the winners aren't taxpayers."
articles.content:
